name: Saola Atacama II Shoes - Women's
description:
Comfy for work, travel, weekend strolls and – okay – pretty much everything. Super lightweight, thanks to the partially recycled outsoles, and rubber panels on the high-contact points of the outsoles help with durability. Plus, each pair of shoes contains 3–4 plastic bottles in them.Uppers made from synthetic leather and recycled PET.Organically grown cotton laces are soft and flexible.Natural cork and Bloom foam insole cushions each step.Bloom is the world's first plant-based performance-driven foam, made with algae biomass.Partially recycled EVA outsoles with rubber panels for grip.Runs slightly small, size up a half to a full size.

        Sustainability
